Package main.controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AttendeeController
    The AttendeeController takes care of actions performed by an Attendee: checking and managing contacts, checking and sending messages, and checking, registering, and dropping from events.
    AuthController
    The AuthController handles authentication, maintains a record of who is logged in, and returns the appropriate controller
    EventController
    The EventController handles event management: create and cancel an event; add or remove a user from the attendee list; organize the speaker; as well as a getter for the current schedule of a User.
    InboxController
    InboxController handles functionality related to retrieving inboxes and their messages
    MessageController
    The MessageController handles different types of users' sending messages features, and could also gives that who could the user message.
    OrganizerController
    Apart from the responsibilities listed in the UserController, the OrganizerController handles advance actions which could be done by an organizer: checking and managing events, creating speaker accounts, and creating rooms.
    ProgramController
    The main constructor of the application that coordinates functionality and stores Singleton objects
    ProgramX  
    UserController
    The UserController is an abstract class for controllers of all user types.
